Verses: 1 appozhudhu Eppiraayeem Manushar Avanai Nokki: Nee Meedhiyaaniyarmel Yuththam Pannappogirapodhu, Engalai Azhaippikkavillaiye, Ippadi Nee Engalukku Seydhadhu Enna Endru; Avanode Balaththa Vaakkuvaadhampanninaargal.
2 adharku Avan: Neengal Seydhadharku Naan Seydhadhu Emmaaththiram? Abiyesriyarin Dhraatchappazhaththin Muzhu Aruppaippaarkkilum, Eppiraayeemarin Meedhiyaana Aruppu Adhigam Allavaa?

3 dhevan Ungal Kaiyile Meedhiyaaniyarin Adhipadhigalaagiya Orebaiyum Sebaiyum Oppukkoduththaare; Neengal Seydhadhilum Naan Seyyakkoodiyadhu Emmaaththiram Endraan; Indha Vaarththaiyai Avan Sonnapodhu, Avanmelirundha Avargaludaiya Kobam Aaritru.
4 kidhiyon Yordhaanukku Vandhapodhu, Avanum Avanodirundha Munnooruperum Adhaik Kadandhupoi, Vidaaiththirundhum (saththuruvai) Pin Thodarndhaargal.

5 avan Sukkoththin Manusharai Nokki: Ennodirukkira Janaththirku Sila Appangalaik Kodungal; Avargal Vidaaiththirukkiraargal, Naan Meedhiyaaniyarin Raajaakkalaagiya Sebaavaiyum Salmunaavaiyum Pinthodarugiren Endraan.
6 adharku Sukkoththin Prabukkal: Un Senaikku Naangal Appam Kodukkiradharku Sebaa Salmunaa Enbavargalin Kai Un Kaivasamaayitro Endraargal.

7 appozhudhu Kidhiyon Avargalai Nokki: Karththar Sebaavaiyum Salmunaavaiyum En Kaiyil Oppukkodukkum Podhu, Ungal Maamsaththai Vanaandharaththin Mullugalaalum Nerinjilgalaalum Kizhiththuviduven Endru Solli,
8 avvidam Vittu, Penoovelukkuppoi, Avvooraaridaththil Andhappadiye Kettaan; Sukkoththin Manushar Pradhiyuththaramaaga Sonnapadiye Penoovelin Manusharum Avanukku Sonnaargal.
9 appozhudhu Avan, Penoovelin Manusharaip Paarththu: Naan Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbivarumpodhu, Indhak Koburaththai Idiththuppoduven Endraan.

10 sebaavum Salmunaavum Avargalodekooda Avargaludaiya Senaigalum Erakkuraiya Padhinaiyaayiram Per Karkoril Irundhaargal; Pattayam Uruvaththakka Latchaththu Irubadhinaayiram Per Vizhundhapadiyaal, Kizhakkaththiyaarin Sagala Senaiyilum Ivargal Maaththiram Meendhirundhaargal.
11 kidhiyon Koodaarangalile Kudiyirukkiravargal Vazhiyaai Nopaagukkum, Yogipeyaavukkum Kizhakke Poi, Andha Senai Bayamillai Endrirundhapodhu, Adhai Muriya Adiththaan.
12 sebaavum Salmunaavum Odipponaargal; Avano Avargalaith Thodarndhu, Sebaa Salmunaa Ennum Meedhiyaaniyarin Irandu Raajaakkalaiyum Pidiththu, Senai Muzhuvadhaiyum Kalangadiththaan.
13 yovaasin Kumaaranaagiya Kidhiyon Yuththampanni, Sooriyan Udhikkum Munne Thirumbivandhapodhu,
14 sukkoththin Manusharil Oru Vaalibanaip Pidiththu, Avanidaththil Visaariththaan; Avan Sukkoththin Prabukkalum Adhin Moopparumaagiya Ezhubaththezhu Manusharin Perai Avanukku Ezhudhikkoduththaan.

15 avan Sukkoththu Ooraaridaththil Vandhu: Idho, Vidaaiththirukkira Un Manusharukku Naangal Appam Kodukkiradharku Sebaa Salmunaa Enbavargalin Kai Un Kaivasamaayitro Endru Neengal Ennai Nindhiththu Sonna Sebaavum Salmunaavum Inge Irukkiraargal Endru Solli,
16 pattanaththin Moopparaip Pidiththu, Vanaandharaththin Mullugalaiyum Nerinjilgalaiyum Konduvandhu, Avaigalaal Sukkoththin Manusharukku Buththivarappanni,
17 penoovelin Koburaththai Idiththu, Avvoor Manusharaiyum Kondru Pottaan.

18 pinbu Avan Sebaavaiyum Salmunaavaiyum Nokki: Neengal Thaaborile Kondru Potta Andha Manushar Eppadippattavargal Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avargal: Neer Eppadippattavaro Avargalum Appadippattavargale; Ovvoruvanum Paarvaikku Raajakumaaranaippolirundhaan Endraargal.

19 appozhudhu Avan: Avargal En Sagodhararum En Thaayin Pillaigalumaayirundhaargal; Avargalai Uyirode Vaiththirundheergalaanaal, Ungalaik Kollaadhiruppen Endru Karththarin Jeevanaikkondu Sollugiren Endru Solli,
20 than Mooththakumaaranaagiya Yeththerai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu, Ivargalai Vettippodu Endraan; Andha Vaaliban Ilaignanaanapadiyaal Bayandhu Than Pattayaththai Uruvaadhirundhaan.

21 appozhudhu Sebaavum Salmunaavum: Neere Ezhundhu Engalmel Vizhum; Manushan Eppadiyo Appadiye Avan Belanum Irukkum Endraargal; Kidhiyon Ezhundhu, Sebaavaiyum Salmunaavaiyum Kondrupottu, Avargal Ottagangalin Kazhuththugalil Irundha Saandhuk Kaaraigalai Eduththukkondaan.

22 appozhudhu Isravel Manushar Kidhiyonai Nokki: Neer Engalai Meedhiyaaniyar Kaikku Neengalaakkivittapadiyinaal Neerum Ummudaiya Kumaaranum, Ummudaiya Kumaaranin Kumaaranum, Engalai Aalakkadaveergal Endraargal.
23 adharkuk Kidhiyon: Naan Ungalai Aalamaatten; En Kumaaranum Ungalai Aalamaattaan; Karththare Ungalai Aaluvaaraaga Endraan.

24 pinbu Kidhiyon Avargalai Nokki: Ungalidaththil Oru Kaariyaththaik Ketkiren; Neengal Avaravar Kollaiyitta Kadukkangalai Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraan. Avargal Ismavelaraayirundhapadiyinaal Avargalidaththil Ponkadukkangal Irundhadhu.
25 isravelar: Sandhoshamaaik Koduppom Endru Solli, Oru Vasthiraththai Viriththu, Avaravar Kollaiyitta Kadukkangalai Adhile Pottaargal.

26 pirai Sindhaakkugalum, Aarangalum, Meedhiyaaniyarin Raajaakkal Porththukkondirundha RaththaambarangalumÂ , Avargaludaiya Ottagangalin Kazhuththugalilirundha Sarappanigalum Allaamal, Avan Kettu Vaangina Ponkadukkangalin Nirai Aayiraththu Ezhunooru Pon Sekkalin Niraiyaayirundhadhu.
27 adhinaal Kidhiyon Oru Epoththai Undaakki, Adhaith Than Ooraana Opraavile Vaiththaan; Isravelarellaarum Adhaip Pinpatri Soramponaargal; Adhu Kidhiyonukkum Avan Veettaarukkum Kanniyaayitru.

28 indhappragaaram Meedhiyaaniyar Thirumba Thalaiyedukkak Koodaadhapadikku, Isravel Puththirarukku Munbaagath Thaazhththappattaargal; Dhesamaanadhu Kidhiyonin Naatkalil Naarpadhuvarusham Amaidhalaayirundhadhu.
29 yovaasin Kumaaranaagiya Yerupaagaal Poi, Than Veettile Vaasamaayirundhaan.
30 kidhiyonukku Anegam Sthreegal Irundhaargal; Avanudaiya Garppappirappaana Kumaarar Ezhubadhuper.
31 seegemilirundha Avanudaiya Marumanaiyaattiyum Avanukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Avanukku Abimelekku Endru Perittaan.
32 pinbu Yovaasin Kumaaranaagiya Kidhiyon Nalla Viruththaappiyaththile Mariththu, Opraavile Than Thagappanaagiya Yovaas Ennum Abiyesriyanudaiya Kallaraiyil Adakkampannappattaan.
33 kidhiyon Mariththapin Isravel Puththirar Thirumbavum Paagaalgalaip Pinpatri Sorampoi, Paagaalpereeththaith Thangalukku Dhevanaaga Vaiththukkondaargal.
34 isravel Puththirar Thangalai Sutrilumirundha Thangal Ellaa Saththurukkalin Kaiyinindrum Thangalai Ratchiththa Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraininaiyaamalum,
35 kidhiyon Ennum Yerupaagaal Isravelukku Seydha Sagala Nanmaikkunthakka Dhayavai Avan Veettaarukkup Paaraattaamalum Ponaargal.
